TopicTitle: Enter LANfest's KSP Tournament Tonight at PAX East

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1h0fQFE"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/cd288b5e6e49a79329e0c3156aa3c7e9/tumblr_inline_n3vyyrm52g1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><span>Are you in Boston for <strong>PAX East</strong>? Not us, but we *will* be there in spirit, thanks to the folks at <strong>Intel LANfest</strong>, who are hosting a <a href="http://bit.ly/1h0fQFE"><strong>KSP tournament</strong> </a>tonight at <strong>8PM EDT</strong>.</span><br/><br/><span>What exactly will the tournament entail? That won’t be reve</span><span class="text_exposed_show">aled until shortly beforehand, but what we do know is that our pals at <a href="http://gaming.logitech.com"><strong>Logitech Gaming</strong></a><span class="Apple-converted-space">*</span>have some top notch hardware, like the G710, G602 and G502 to present to the winners. Do your best and reap the rewards!<br/></span></p>

<p></p>

closer to possible then the last tournament.... but not close enough ...
